medical_history.chief_complaint: Polyarthralgia involving the left and right hands, wrists, elbows, ankles, and knees.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began 6 months prior to presentation and involved worsening pain over the course of the day. Symptoms were not associated with morning stiffness.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Vitamin D deficiency, hypertension, rehabilitation for burns.
medical_history.family_history: An aunt who died of systemic lupus erythematosus and a brother with arthritis.
